What do you do after the torrent downloads?
Hello! what will i do after the download is finished? should i burn the files onto a CD? pls reply...thank you
OK, so I extracted this with 7zip and now i have no idea what to do... i just see thousands of folders each with dozens of files... how do I run the actual software for a given language?
Hi, I tried using the autorun.exe, but when try the "run rossetta stone language system" button, i get an error that the .INI file is missing? what can I do to fix this?

the english US level 2 isnt's working...

when i tried to install it the cd label detected by RS name blank instead of english level 2 do i cant install it...

This has been asked before, but no reply, so I'll ask again.
After the download is finished, what the hell do you do? I've put everything from the zip into a folder. Now I've no idea what to do. I tried the autorun. Once it starts it says there is no language data found.
Click autorun (the application) -> Splash Screen pops up -> A window named setup pops up (has "Run Rosetta Stone Language System", "Configure Rosetta Stone Language System", "Language Help Documents", "Visit web site", "Browse DVD", and "Exit") -> Click Run -> TheRosettaStone window pops up. And like I've said, once it starts it says there is no language data found.
I'd really appreciate it if I got an answer so I can figure this out. I'd like to start learning Japanese because I am studying abroad at Japan next year.

Thank you very much for this info and the uploads.

Kimo Pront (another Kentuckian)
Cheers Kid, another trouble free upload and installation.
